Articles.Content: hey guys we all love ksp but if you guys add multiplayer the game would be a heck of a lot better

The official word is that it's a planned free expansion for after 1.0. In the meantime you could try the Dark Multiplayer mod, which adds multiplayer play right now.

This suggestion is so common that it's on our What Not To Suggest list, so I'm afraid I have to lock this.
